item.title: Man stabs another to death over petty issue in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A man stabbed another to death over a petty issue at Zakir Hussain Circle in Raichur on Sunday.
The deceased has been identified as 30-year-old Sadik, a resident of Zahirabad, Raichur.
The Sadar Bazaar Police, who rushed to the spot after receiving information, arrested the accused Kareem who is a native of Jani Mohalla in the city.
It is said that a quarrel over eating idli between the deceased and the accused turned ugly following which the accused stabbed the deceased with weapons.
Howeve...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Raichur: Minor Dispute Between Friends Turns Fatal in Shocking Murder
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: A minor altercation over a breakfast dispute turned deadly on Saturday morning when a youth was stabbed to death at Khakir Hussain Circle in Raichur city.
The victim has been identified as Sadiq (30), a resident of Zaheerabad block. According to reports, Sadiq and his friends, including a man named Karim, regularly gathered to eat idlis near Zakir Hussain Circle on Ek Minar Road. On this particular morning, a trivial disagreement escalated between Sadiq and Karim regarding the food, le...]]>
item.author: The Hindustan Gazette
